extendedInfo.description: This app prints out the referral information (if any) that was provided to the Android Market for this app.See http://code.google.com/apis/analytics/docs/mobile/android.html#android-market-tracking for how to generate the referral information. This app's package name is com.carlos.referrerSource available at https://github.com/mrcarlosrendon/Android-Market-Referral-Dump
